DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate whether finnish binding pancreatico-jejunal anastomosis is feasible and prevents the risk for post operative pancreatic fistula after distal pancreeatectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Pancreatic Stump Closure After Distal Pancreatic Resection
